page.title: 05Flat Farmland
page.content: Map ref 240180 This area is flat farmland on the Trent floodplain.Cereals and potatoes are the chief crops. Barley,the main cereal,supplies the Burton breweries. Morris Croft,the only building in the square,is now a private residence.The Stapenhill to Rosliston Lane and the Swadlincote to Drakelow Lane serve the area,meeting at the cross-roads in the north.The latter is used by employees at{Drakelow Power Station}living in the Swadlincote district.It is also heavily used by coal lorries operating from the South Derbyshire and Leicestershire collieries which supply the Power Station.
